name: Five Nights At Melon's
description:
To Play For PC Please Run bluestacks,

This game is basically fnaf, it takes place on a scary facility, they are tested and make sure no one on public See's it after the “ incident ”, 7 animatronics, they are...

Melon - Just a fast Animatronic, comes on the left side

Pumkin - a crying slow animatronic, and comes on the left side

Corn - Just a fast Animatronic, and comes on the left side

Melon2 - a slow animatronic, and comes on the right side

Pumkin2 - a crying fast Animatronic, and also comes on the right side

Corn2 - a slow animatronic, and comes on the right side

5hë Bï5é (Currupt Melon) - kills you when your power goes down,
